userQuery: Create a comprehensive SaaS dashboard with a sleek header containing user avatar and notifications, a collapsible sidebar with navigation menu, main content area featuring KPI metric cards in a grid layout, interactive charts showing revenue and user growth trends, a data table with recent transactions, and a floating action button for quick actions. Include proper spacing, shadows, and modern UI elements.
plan:
# SaaS Dashboard Page – Structural Plan

## 1) Global Layout
- Layout Grid: Responsive 12-column grid, max-width container for main content, full-height viewport layout
- Regions:
  - Header/Navigation (fixed top)
  - Sidebar (collapsible, left)
  - Main Content (scrollable)
  - Footer (sticky when content short)
- Spacing & Visuals: 8px spacing scale, section gutters, card shadows (elevation 1–3), rounded corners (6–12px), subtle dividers
- Theming: Light/dark mode tokens; primary/neutral color palettes

Data needed (global):
- User info (name, avatar URL, role, notifications count & list)
- Navigation items (label, icon, route, badge)
- Permissions/feature flags
- App branding (logo, product name)

Component families covered: layout, navigation, data display, forms, buttons/CTAs, feedback/toasts/modals

---

## 2) Header / Navigation (Top App Bar)
- Components:
  - Brand Logo + Product Name (left)
  - Global Search Bar (center) – typeahead, keyboard nav
  - Actions (right):
    - Notification Bell (with badge + dropdown panel)
    - Quick Settings Icon Button (theme, density)
    - User Avatar Menu (profile, account, sign out)
- Behavior:
  - Sticky on scroll; subtle shadow
  - Search suggestions dropdown over main content
- Data Requirements:
  - Branding assets
  - Search data source (endpoints for entities: users, transactions, docs)
  - Notifications list (id, title, type, time, read)
  - User profile (name, email, avatar, org, role)

---

## 3) Sidebar (Collapsible Navigation)
- Components:
  - Collapse/Expand Toggle Button (top)
  - Navigation Menu (grouped): Dashboard, Analytics, Transactions, Customers, Settings
  - Section Headers & Badges (e.g., New)
  - Footer Mini Section: App version, help link
- Behavior:
  - Collapsed: icons-only with tooltips; expanded: icons + labels
  - Active route highlighting
  - Keyboard focus management
- Data Requirements:
  - Nav items (icon, label, route, badge, roles)
  - Current route
  - User permissions

---

## 4) Main Content
### 4.1 Page Header Row
- Components:
  - Page Title: “Dashboard”
  - Date Range Filter (form: preset dropdown + custom range picker)
  - Secondary Actions: Export Button, Refresh Icon Button
- Data Requirements:
  - Current date range
  - Available presets
  - User permissions for export

### 4.2 KPI Metric Cards Grid
- Layout: Responsive grid (2–4 columns depending on width)
- Components per Card:
  - Metric Title (e.g., MRR, Active Users, Churn, ARPU)
  - Primary Value (formatted)
  - Delta Badge (trend up/down with color)
  - Mini Sparkline (last 30 days)
  - Info Tooltip
- Data Requirements:
  - KPI definitions & formatting rules
  - Time-series for sparkline
  - Comparison period values

### 4.3 Interactive Charts Section
- Layout: Two charts side-by-side on desktop; stacked on mobile
- Charts:
  - Revenue Trend (area/line with monthly aggregation)
  - User Growth (line/bar with cohorts or new vs returning)
- Interactions:
  - Hover tooltips, legend toggles, series show/hide
  - Brush/zoom for ranges
  - Download chart as PNG/CSV
- Controls:
  - Granularity selector (Daily/Weekly/Monthly)
  - Segment filter (Plan, Region)
- Data Requirements:
  - Time-series datasets with timestamps, values, segments
  - Available segments and metadata

### 4.4 Recent Transactions Data Table
- Components:
  - Table with sticky header, zebra rows, row hover
  - Columns: Date, Customer, Plan, Amount, Status, Payment Method, Actions
  - Column Sorting, Column Visibility menu
  - Pagination (server-side), Page size selector
  - Row Selection (checkbox), Bulk Actions bar
  - Row Actions: View, Refund, Receipt
  - Inline Filters: Status (pill filter), Amount range, Search
  - Empty/Loading/Skeleton states
- Data Requirements:
  - Transactions dataset (paginated): id, fields per column
  - Sort options, filter options
  - User permissions (refund)

### 4.5 Secondary Panels (Optional)
- Components:
  - Announcements/Changelog Card
  - System Health Card (API latency, errors)
- Data Requirements:
  - Feed items, system metrics

---

## 5) Floating Action Button (FAB)
- Placement: Bottom-right over content with safe-area insets
- Primary Action: “Create” speed-dial
- Components:
  - FAB Button (elevated, shadow 4)
  - Speed-Dial Menu: New Invoice, Add Customer, Create Report
- Behavior:
  - Expands on click/keyboard; closes on outside click/escape
- Data Requirements:
  - User permissions
  - Routes or modal configs for actions

---

## 6) Footer
- Components:
  - Copyright
  - Links: Privacy, Terms, Status, Docs
  - Language selector (compact)
- Data Requirements:
  - App metadata, links, locales

---

## 7) Feedback & System Messages
- Components:
  - Toasts (success/error/info) for actions (export, refund)
  - Inline Alerts (banner for maintenance)
  - Loading Indicators (global top progress bar; skeletons for cards/table)
  - Empty States with CTA
  - Error Boundaries (retry button)
- Data Requirements:
  - Operation statuses, error messages

---

## 8) Forms & Modals (Invoked by Actions)
- Components:
  - Date Range Modal (advanced)
  - Refund Transaction Modal: reason textarea, amount input, confirm button
  - Create Customer Drawer: form fields, validation, submit/cancel
- Data Requirements:
  - Form schemas, defaults, validation rules
  - API endpoints for submit

---

## 9) Component Hierarchy & Relationships
- AppShell
  - Header
    - Brand
    - Search
    - Actions (Notifications, Settings, User Menu)
  - Sidebar (collapsible)
    - Nav Groups -> Nav Items
  - ContentArea
    - PageHeader
      - Title, Filters, Actions
    - KPIGrid
      - KPICard x N (title, value, delta, sparkline)
    - ChartsRow
      - RevenueChart
      - UserGrowthChart
    - TransactionsSection
      - FiltersBar
      - DataTable
      - Pagination
    - SecondaryPanels
  - FAB (speed-dial)
  - Footer
  - Toasts/Modals (portal layer)

Data flow:
- Global filters (date range, segments) propagate to KPI, Charts, Table queries
- User/permissions influence visibility of actions and nav
- Loading/error states bubbled to feedback components

---

## 10) Accessibility & Interactions (Structural)
- Keyboard: tab order, skip-to-content link, ARIA roles for nav, table, dialogs
- Focus states visible; tooltip with aria-describedby
- Responsive: breakpoints for sidebar collapse, grid columns, chart stacking

---

## 11) Performance & State
- Client state: selected date range, filters, column visibility
- Server state: KPIs, charts, transactions (cache + SWR)
- Code-splitting: charts and modals lazy-loaded

---

## 12) Required Data Summary by Section
- Header: user profile, notifications, branding
- Sidebar: nav items, permissions, active route
- Page Header: date presets, current range
- KPI Grid: metrics definitions, time-series, comparisons
- Charts: time-series by segment, granularity options
- Transactions Table: paginated transactions, sort/filter schema
- FAB: permitted actions
- Footer: metadata, links, locales
- Feedback/Modals: operation statuses, validation schemas
